eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
 U_{nm} \!\!\!&\equiv\!\!\!& \int\!\!{\rm d} x_2 \: {\rm Re}\left\{ \bar{u \right\}_{(n)i}\partial_2u_{(m)}^i}, 
 \nonumber\\
 V_{nm} \!\!\!&\equiv\!\!\!& \int\!\!{\rm d} x_2 \: {\rm Im}\left\{ \bar{u \right\}_{(n)i}u_{(m)}^i}. 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 g_{(nm)} \!\!\!&\equiv\!\!\!& \int\!\!{\rm d} x_2 \: {\rm Im}\left( \bar{u \right)_{(n)i}u_{(m)}^i}, \nonumber\\
 V \!\!\!&\equiv\!\!\!& \sum_{N=3}^\infty \sum_{n_1,\cdots,n_N} 
 \left\{ 4\int\!\!{\rm d} x_2 \: {\rm Im}\left( \frac{e^{-i\delta \right\ \right)}{N!}u_{(n_1)}^{i_1}\cdots 
 u_{(n_N)}^{i_N}W_{i_1\cdots i_N}}}\varphi_{(n_1)}\cdots\varphi_{(n_N)}, 
 \nonumber\\
 \tilde{V} \!\!\!&\equiv\!\!\!& \sum_{N=1}^\infty \sum_{n_1,\cdots,n_N} 
 \left\{ 4\int\!\!{\rm d} x_2 \: {\rm Im}\left( \frac{e^{-i\delta \right\ \right)}{N!}u_{(n_1)}^{i_1}\cdots 
 u_{(n_N)}^{i_N}W_{i_1\cdots i_N}}}\varphi_{(n_1)}\cdots\varphi_{(n_N)}, 
 \nonumber\\
 U \!\!\!&\equiv\!\!\!& \sum_{N=2}^\infty \sum_{n_1,\cdots,n_N} 
 \left\{ 4\int\!\!{\rm d} x_2 \: {\rm Re}\left( \frac{e^{-i\delta \right\ \right)}{N!}u_{(n_1)}^{i_1}\cdots 
 u_{(n_N)}^{i_N}W_{i_1\cdots i_N}}}\varphi_{(n_1)}\cdots\varphi_{(n_N)}.  
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 {\cal D}_m \rho_0 \!\!\!&=\!\!\!& (\omega^{-1})_m^{\;n}\partial_n\rho_0=\partial_m\rho_0+{\cal O}(\kappa^2), 
 \nonumber\\
 {\cal D}_{2\alpha}\rho_0 \!\!\!&=\!\!\!& D_{2\alpha}\rho_0+2\zeta_{0\alpha}
 -i\kappa^2D_{2\alpha}\zeta_0\gamma_{(3)}^m\zeta_0(\omega^{-1})_m^{\;n}\partial_n\rho_0, 
 \nonumber\\
 {\cal D}_m\zeta_{0\beta} \!\!\!&=\!\!\!& (\omega^{-1})_m^{\;n}\partial_n\zeta_{0\beta}
 =\partial_m\zeta_{0\beta}+{\cal O}(\kappa^2), \nonumber\\
 {\cal D}_{2\alpha}\zeta_{0\beta} \!\!\!&=\!\!\!& D_{2\alpha}\zeta_{0\beta}
 -i\kappa^2D_{2\alpha}\zeta_0\gamma_{(3)}^m\zeta_0(\omega^{-1})_m^{\;n}\partial_n\zeta_{0\beta}, 
 \nonumber\\
 {\cal D}_m\phi \!\!\!&=\!\!\!& (\omega^{-1})_m^{\;n}\partial_n\phi=\partial_m\phi+{\cal O}(\kappa^2), 
 \nonumber\\
 {\cal D}_{2\alpha}\phi \!\!\!&=\!\!\!& D_{2\alpha}\phi
 -i\kappa^2D_{2\alpha}\zeta_0\gamma_{(3)}^m\zeta_0(\omega^{-1})_m^{\;n}\partial_n\phi, 
 \label{cov_drvs1}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 S_{\mbox{\scriptsize NG bosonic}}^{\mbox{\scriptsize on-shell}} \!\!\!&=\!\!\!& 
 \int\!\!{\rm d}^3x 
 \frac{-\partial^ma_0\partial_ma_0}{1+\sqrt{1+\kappa^2\partial^ma_0\partial_ma_0}} \nonumber\\
 \!\!\!&=\!\!\!& \int\!\!{\rm d}^3x \: \kappa^{-2}\left\{ 1-\sqrt{1+\kappa^2\partial^ma_0\partial_ma_0 \right\}}. 
 \label{Nambu-Goto}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 \zeta_{0\alpha} \!\!\!&=\!\!\!& -\frac{1}{2}D_{2\alpha}\rho_0+{\cal O}(\kappa^2), 
 \nonumber\\
 \lambda_0^m \!\!\!&=\!\!\!& iD_2\gamma_{(3)}^m\zeta_0+{\cal O}(\kappa^2)
 =-\partial^m\rho_0+{\cal O}(\kappa^2), \nonumber\\
 \sigma_0 \!\!\!&=\!\!\!& \frac{1}{2}D_2^\alpha\zeta_{0\alpha}+{\cal O}(\kappa^2) 
 =-\frac{1}{4}D_2^2\rho_0+{\cal O}(\kappa^2). 
\
